actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an interest deduction for contingent interest on a shared appreciation mortgage.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit, as an interest deduction, the deduction of contingent interest on a shared appreciation mortgage. Defines the term "contingent interest."

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an interest deduction for contingent interest on a shared appreciation mortgage.
